content.title: Good news... / Goed nieuws...
content.creator:
DutchWorkX3D
January 27, 2025
content.content:
We have been in contact with a fireman who also works for a fire prevention company and he is going to introduce us to his company R&D to see if we can work together on this project.
We zijn in contact met een brandweerman die ook bij een brandbeveiligingsbedrijf werkt en hij kan ons in contact brengen met de ontwikkel afdeling om dit project wellicht naar produktie te kunnen loodsen.

content.title: Unsolicited asking for help and support with this project
content.creator:
DutchWorkX3D
January 24, 2025
content.content:
If you are willing to back us..........always ok
If you are a Backer.......perfect and thank you.
If you are asking questions because you want to have more info 
before you back us........always ok and we are happy to answer your questions.
If you are none of the above and are trying to get some marketing, social or any other work.....
Then stop and leave.
Thank you. 
DutchWorkX3D
